style.pr_zip: {font color='#FFFFFF' face='Microsoft YaHei,微软雅黑' size='18'}已加载[$prtage]%{/font}
style.pr_load: {font color='#FFFFFF' face='Microsoft YaHei,微软雅黑' size='18'}已加载[$prtage]%{/font}
style.pr_noload: {font color='#FFFFFF' face='Microsoft YaHei,微软雅黑' size='18'}加载失败,您可以尝试刷新页面或者更换不同源观看{/font}
style.pr_buffer: {font color='#FFFFFF' face='Microsoft YaHei,微软雅黑' size='16'}[$buffer]%{/font}
style.pr_play: {font color='#FFFFFF' face='Microsoft YaHei,微软雅黑' size='18'}播放{/font}
style.pr_pause: {font color='#FFFFFF' face='Microsoft YaHei,微软雅黑' size='18'}暂停{/font}
style.pr_mute: {font color='#FFFFFF' face='Microsoft YaHei,微软雅黑' size='18'}静音{/font}
style.pr_nomute: {font color='#FFFFFF' face='Microsoft YaHei,微软雅黑' size='18'}取消{/font}
style.pr_full: {font color='#FFFFFF' face='Microsoft YaHei,微软雅黑' size='18'}全屏{/font}
style.pr_time: {font color='#FFFFFF' face='Microsoft YaHei,微软雅黑' size='18'}[$Time]{/font}
style.pr_volume: {font color='#FFFFFF' face='Microsoft YaHei,微软雅黑' size='18'}音量[$Volume]%{/font}
style.pr_adv: {font color='#FFFFFF' size='12'}广告剩余：{font color='#FF0000' size='15'}{b}[$Second]{/b}{/font} 秒{/font}
